text: Suxian Hill () also known as the 18th blessed land of China, is located 2 kilometers east of Chenzhou, Hunan, China. It covers 15 square kilometers.http://www.halfthesky.org/en/node/3270 There are many historical legends associated with it. There are also Taoist relics there. The Suxian Temple on top of the hill is the main scenic spot.http://www.travelchinaguide.com/cityguides/hunan/chenzhou/ ==References== Category:Landforms of Hunan Category:Hills of China
title: Suxian Hill
